subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Lorena Ochoa shot an eight-under-par 65 to take a one-stroke lead over Michelle Wie and Na Yeon Choi after the first round of the LPGA Tour’s Corona Championship in Morella, Mexico.
snippet: The defending champion Lorena Ochoa shot an eight-under-par 65 to take a one-stroke lead over Michelle Wie and Na Yeon Choi after the first round of the LPGA Tour’s Corona Championship in Morella, Mexico.
